long_description: Crunch away on bite-sized Apple Clusters from Peeled Snacks and get a full serving of fruit, without refined sugar, fat or preservatives. Apple Clusters are organic, non-GMO and gluten-free. Convenient 4-serving pouch can be tucked in your hiking pack, work tote or kid's lunch box. Each serving contains 1/4 cup of fruit and 60 calories. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Crunch away on bite-sized Apple Clusters from Peeled Snacks and get a full serving of fruit, without refined sugar, fat or preservatives. Apple Clusters are organic, non-GMO and gluten-free.
